title: Miami Beaches
abstract: Miami is home to some of the most beautiful beaches in the world. From the lively shores of South Beach to the serene Key Biscayne, there’s a perfect spot for everyone to enjoy the sun, sand, and surf.

services.title: South Beach
services.intro: The iconic South Beach is known for its vibrant atmosphere, crystal clear waters, and Art Deco buildings lining Ocean Drive.
list: Lummus Park: A beachfront park perfect for picnics, volleyball, and outdoor workouts.
Ocean Drive: Famous for its nightlife and historic Art Deco architecture.
South Pointe Park: A peaceful spot at the southern tip of South Beach with great views and a fishing pier.

services.title: Key Biscayne
services.intro: Escape the crowds and head to the quiet shores of Key Biscayne, perfect for family outings and watersports.
list: Crandon Park Beach: A family-friendly beach with calm waters, picnic areas, and a golf course.
Bill Baggs Cape Florida State Park: Explore the historic Cape Florida Lighthouse and enjoy unspoiled beaches.
Virginia Key Beach Park: Known for its eco-adventures, including kayaking, paddleboarding, and biking trails.

services.title: Surfside Beach
services.intro: A hidden gem just north of Miami Beach, Surfside offers a more laid-back beach experience, perfect for relaxation.
list: Surfside Community Center: Access to the beach, pool, and a variety of activities for the family.
Harding Avenue: A strip of restaurants and shops that provide a quieter, local atmosphere.
Bal Harbour Shops: Luxury shopping just steps away from the beach.

services.title: Haulover Beach
services.intro: One of the most diverse beaches in Miami, Haulover Beach is famous for its clothing-optional section and wide range of activities.
list: Haulover Park: Offers picnic areas, a marina, and off-leash dog beach sections.
Clothing-Optional Section: Popular among visitors looking for a free-spirited beach day.
Kite Flying Area: A designated spot for kite flying and windsurfing enthusiasts.

packages.title: Sunset Beach Picnic
packages.description: Enjoy a beautifully prepared sunset picnic at South Beach with curated local delicacies and drinks.

packages.title: Kayaking Tour of Biscayne Bay
packages.description: Paddle through the crystal-clear waters of Biscayne Bay, exploring mangroves and spotting marine wildlife.

packages.title: Private Yacht Beach Day
packages.description: Sail along Miami’s coastline and enjoy a day at a secluded beach with a private yacht and full catering service.

packages.title: Surfing Lessons at Surfside
packages.description: Learn to surf with expert instructors at Surfside Beach. Perfect for beginners and intermediate surfers.

packages.title: Snorkeling at Crandon Park
packages.description: Explore the underwater world of Biscayne Bay with a guided snorkeling tour, perfect for all skill levels.

packages.title: Beach Yoga at Sunrise
packages.description: Start your day with a rejuvenating yoga session on the shores of Key Biscayne as the sun rises over the ocean.
